channel.title: Comments on: The Biblical & Theological Basis for the Threefold Division of the Law

item.title: By: Brandon Adams
item.dc:creator: Brandon Adams
item.description: I look forward to your review. The title of the book would seem to suggest a two-fold division, rather than three-fold. The law written by the finger of God in stone, and the rest of the law written by Moses. That's the way I see the Mosaic law at least.
item.content:encoded: I look forward to your review. The title of the book would seem to suggest a two-fold division, rather than three-fold. The law written by the finger of God in stone, and the rest of the law written by Moses. That’s the way I see the Mosaic law at least.

item.title: By: Richard Barcellos
item.dc:creator: Richard Barcellos
item.description:
This just in from the publisher:
"Dear Dr Barcellos,
Thank you for your email. We shall gladly send you a review copy of From the Finger of God as requested."
This makes me happy.
item.content:encoded:
This just in from the publisher:

“Dear Dr Barcellos,

Thank you for your email. We shall gladly send you a review copy of From the Finger of God as requested.”

This makes me happy.
